activities: Stroz Friedberg acts as a data processor on behalf of Clients and/or their legal counsel during the provision of any of the following services: data recovery, electronic discovery, digital forensics and/or related consulting services. Client Personal Data may be collected in the EU by the Client directly or by Stroz Friedberg personnel at the Client’s direction.  Client Personal Data may be sent to Stroz Friedberg in the United States by the Client or by Stroz Friedberg at the Client’s direction.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, customer, HR, including on-line, off-line, and manually processed
recoursemech: Any individual may refer a privacy issue to Stroz Friedberg's Office of the General Counsel. Stroz Friedberg has chosen the EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner, as applicable, to serve as an independent recourse mechanism for dispute resolution arising from collection, use, and retention of personal information transferred from EU member countries to the United States.
